document_title: Hand, foot and mouth disease: Causes, symptoms and care
subsection_name: benh-tay-chan-mieng.json_3_Diagnosis of hand, foot and mouth
subsection_content:
Most cases of hand, foot and mouth disease are diagnosed through clinical examination and based on the child's symptoms, age and medical condition. However, in some cases, the doctor may ask the child to perform some tests such as:
Oropharyngeal fluid testing;; Test secretions from ulcers.
subsection_title: benh tay chan mieng.json. Diagnosis of hand, foot and mouth
